Find Purple Air sensors within radial distance

Source: R/pas_within.R
pas_within.Rd

Calculate Purple Air sensors within a specified distance from a target Purple Air sensor.

pas_within(pas, label = NULL, radius = "1 km")

Arguments

pas

a pa_synoptic dataframe
label

a target (centered) Purple Air sensor label
radius

a distance with unit (i.e "15 km")

Value

a pa_synoptic object

Details

radius should be a numeric string with provided metric unit, such as "250 m".

Examples

pas_within(example_pas,"SaratogaMiddleHighSchool", "1024 km")
#> # A tibble: 1,244 x 40
